name: Super Peaceshaker
description:
Keep the earth safe and peacefull by shaking hands of out most loved leaders! Destroy atomic missles by tapping on them!

Handshake is most common ritual of western civilisation. Historic moments are often presented by images of leaders shaking their hands. If we make all the world leaders shake their hands we achieve peace on earth. You are mediator. Your task is to sustain good relations between nations and politics.

Game by:

Mechanmx

Elparole

Seyn
